channel.title: Story Waters - 20 Minutes to Imagine
channel.description: Enjoy these free videos, mp3s and pdfs from spiritual speaker and author Story Waters. Videos will generally appear under spiritual TV Shows within iTunes and on your iPod/iPhone (or occassionaly under movies). Visit storywaters.org for more downloads.
channel.itunes:subtitle: Story Waters - advanced energetic self-awareness and cutting edge conscious creatorship
channel.itunes:summary: Enjoy these free videos, mp3s and pdfs from spiritual speaker and author Story Waters. Videos will generally appear under spiritual TV Shows within iTunes and on your iPod/iPhone (or occassionaly under movies). Visit storywaters.org for more downloads.
channel.itunes:author: Story Waters

image.title: Story Waters - 20 Minutes to Imagine
image.description: Enjoy the 20 Minutes to Imagination free audio collection from spiritual speaker and author Story Waters. Several other videos and mp3s are also included. Visit storywaters.org for more downloads.

item.title: How to Transform the Pressures in Your Life.
item.description: 20 Minutes to Imagine: How to Transform the Pressures in Your Life. Taken from the April 2010 Freedom from Pressure Freedom Circle broadcast. Visit: http://www.storywaters.org for more.
item.itunes:subtitle: 20 Minutes to Imagine: How to Transform the Pressures in Your Life.
item.itunes:summary: 20 Minutes to Imagine: How to Transform the Pressures in Your Life. Taken from the April 2010 Freedom from Pressure Freedom Circle broadcast. Visit: http://www.storywaters.org for more
item.itunes:author: Story Waters

item.title: Why, from the perspective of your spirit, life is so amazing.
item.description: 20 Minutes to Imagine: Why, from the perspective of your spirit, life is so amazing. Hear Story describe the beauty and wonder of planet Earth through the eyes of spirit in this uplifting and heartfelt love letter to life. Wake up to why you chose to come to this world through this breath taking expression of the Source Consciousness that we each are. Taken from The Weekend of Lights seminar. Visit: http://www.storywaters.org for more.
item.itunes:subtitle: 20 Minutes to Imagine: Why, from the perspective of your spirit, life is so amazing.
item.itunes:summary: 20 Minutes to Imagine: Why, from the perspective of your spirit, life is so amazing. Hear Story describe the beauty and wonder of planet Earth through the eyes of spirit in this uplifting and heartfelt love letter to life. Wake up to why you chose to come to this world through this breath taking expression of the Source Consciousness that we each are. Taken from Bringer of Light from The Weekend of Lights seminar. Visit: http://www.storywaters.org for more.
item.itunes:author: Story Waters

item.title: How to successfullly use the Law of Attraction.
item.description: 20 Minutes to Imagine: How to successfullly use the Law of Attraction. By taking you on a journey into the heart of your being, Story explains the Law of Attraction from the inside out, showing you how to use the feeling of your spirit to clear out unwanted 'energetic baggage' from your life to create a clear foundation onto which you can birth your dream into reality. Taken from The Law of Attraction 101 broadcast. Visit: http://www.storywaters.org for more.
item.itunes:subtitle: 20 Minutes to Imagine: How to successfullly use the Law of Attraction.
item.itunes:summary: 20 Minutes to Imagine: How to successfullly use the Law of Attraction. By taking you on a journey into the heart of your being, Story explains the Law of Attraction from the inside out, showing you how to use the feeling of your spirit to clear out unwanted 'energetic baggage' from your life to create a clear foundation onto which you can birth your dream into reality. Taken from The Law of Attraction 101 broadcast. Visit: http://www.storywaters.org for more.
item.itunes:author: Story Waters

item.title: Bringing new consciousness to the relationships in your life.
item.description: 20 Minutes to Imagine: Bringing new consciousness to the relationships in your life. You are choosing each and every relationship in your life. The energy of these relationships plays a strong part in the unfolding of your life. Are you prepared to change your life by looking at the relationships in your life through the lens of freedom consciousness? Are you ready to act from the heart as to whom you share your life with? Taken from No More Cords. Entering New Energy Relationships. Visit: http://www.storywaters.org for more.
item.itunes:subtitle: 20 Minutes to Imagine: Bringing new consciousness to the relationships in your life.
item.itunes:summary: 20 Minutes to Imagine: Bringing new consciousness to the relationships in your life. You are choosing each and every relationship in your life. item.title: The Guided Breath Meditation
item.description: 20 Minutes to Imagine: The Guided Breath Meditation. Discover how life can be as simple as breathing in what you want and breathing out what you don't want in this popular guided breath meditation. Lay back to enjoy! Taken from The Law of Attraction 101 broadcast. Visit: http://www.storywaters.org for more.
item.itunes:subtitle: 20 Minutes to Imagine: The Guided Breath Meditation
